ROM.Changelog:
# AIM System V3.2 Update:
- Merged April Security Patch - Latest substratum changes - Added Custom Carrier Lable - Added Ambient Ticker - Face Unlock - Notification Ticker Fixups - Statusbar Clock and Date customizations - Allow using 4G icon instead LTE toggle - Make roaming indicator optional - Option to Display Data Disabled Indicator Icon - Small tile scroller - QS Headers - Suspend Actions - Automatic albumart for Pulse - Less and smart notifications - Three finger swipe screenshot - CM screen security settings - Expanded desktop - Added Music, Weather, Google assist qs tiles - Volume key cursor control - Volume key music control - Volume key answer - DU hardware action key binding - Custom Button light - Lockscreen Visualizer - Statusbar weather - Lockscreen Weather - Ambient Botton View options - Battery Bar - Added ticker scroll - Added kill button to notification guts - Statusbar battery styles - Slim recents icon management - Statusbar brightness control - Android P transitions with on/off toggle - Screen off animations - Option to disable scrolling cache - Quickly open Running Services from QS panel - QS Pulldown - Double tap to sleep on statusbar - Ruthless Pixel Launcher - more and more....
#LetsAimify
---
# Note :
_Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._
---
